ygData.subject: Re: Two handed
ygData.msgSnippet: No, you can train as many points as you have to it, providing you have the cash to go along with the training points. I didnt start training my 2hs until level
ygData.messageBody:
No, you can train as many points as you have to it, providing you have the
cash to go along with the training points.
I didnt start training my 2hs until level 25 or 26 i think. I put 20 points
to it right off the bat... Capped it at level 30, and that was with
maintaining my 1hs cap as well.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule
-----Original Message-----
From: netmarine [mailto:specops@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 7:40 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] Two handed


I have used one handed slash all my characters life. I am currently lvl
16, and having a hard time building up two handed slash. I tried last level
with no ranks in it, then I tried again with 5 ranks in it. Do I have to
wait to level again so I can train 5 more ranks in it?
